String.string: I'm counting on you. We all are.
Hunt {@Creature:47#3001#contaminated wendigos}, {@Creature:47#3002#argononomorph wendigos}, and {@Creature:47#3003#argonomorph wendigo shamans} in {@Rgn:47004$$Blightroar} and collect tokens.
See {@Creature:247#1005$$Chenace} in {@Rgn:47007$$Blightroar Research Station} for your reward.
